Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class UpdateMessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.UpdateMessageBuilder
public class UpdateMessageBuilder extends Object
Class UpdateMessageBuilder is responsible for the assembly of an UpdateMessage carrying the information about changes in the model state. According to the update type a specific Message is built and passed off to GameController class. Each Message is going to be broadcast to all players in game.
